title: Mitsotakis and Nobel Laureate Hassabis Discuss AI's Future in Greece
description: Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis and Nobel laureate Demis Hassabis, the CEO of Google DeepMind, held a public discussion in Athens about the future of artificial intelligence and its potential applications in Greece.
content:
Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis and Nobel laureate Demis Hassabis, the CEO of Google DeepMind, held a public discussion in Athens about the future of artificial intelligence and its potential applications in Greece.

title: Google DeepMind CEO says learning how to learn will be next generation's most needed skill
description: Demis Hassabis, a Google DeepMind scientist, spoke in Athens. He highlighted the importance of learning how to learn. Rapid AI changes demand new skills. Hassabis predicts artificial general intelligence could arrive within a decade. This could lead to radical abundance. Greek Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis discussed AI use in government. He warned about potential financial inequality.
content:

title: Apple's AI and search executive Robby Walker to leave, Bloomberg News reports
description: Robby Walker, a senior AI executive, is departing Apple amid concerns about the company's slow progress in artificial intelligence. This exit follows other AI executives leaving for Meta, including Ruoming Pang. Apple's AI initiatives, such as Siri's upgrade, face delays, raising questions about its ability to compete with AI leaders like Google.
content:

title: IT Layoffs News: Elon Musk's AI Startup Fired 500 Workers - Check Reason
description: IT Layoffs News: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI laid off at least 500 workers from its data annotation team on Friday night.
content:

title: Meet Diella from Albania, the world’s first AI-made minister
description: Albania has become the first country in the world to induct an artificial intelligence–powered government minister.
content: On Thursday, September 11, Rama introduced the AI minister at the Socialist Party’s assembly event in Tirana. Diell is the only non-human member of the government. “Diella is the first member not physically present but virtually created by artificial... [1192 chars]

title: Google's top AI scientist says ‘learning how to learn’ will be next generation's most needed skill
description: ATHENS, Greece — A top Google scientist and 2024 Nobel laureate said Friday that the most important skill for the next generation will be “learning how to learn” to keep pace with change as Artificial Intelligence transforms education and the workplace.

title: India aims for two PSBs on world top 20 list by 2047
description: Strengthening corporate governance in PSBs, improving customer experience, and making them globally competitive through modernisation — including use of artificial intelligence — are among key issues being deliberated at the two-day PSB Manthan conclave that began on Friday, an official said.

title: Role of Artificial Intelligence in the Solar, Hydro, and Renewable Energy Sector
description: Rashim Deepika Artificial Intelligence (AI) is emerging as a game-changer across multiple sectors, and its impact on the renewable energy domain is particularly transformative. The growing focus on clean energy, energy efficiency, and sustainable development calls for innovative solutions that can reduce costs, improve efficiency, and ensure timely project execution. AI has the potential to revolutionize the solar sector, hydro sector, solarization of government buildings, installation and commissioning of renewable energy plants, and even the monitoring and maintenance of infrastructure […]
